title: Google\Cloud\Core\Testing\TestHelpers
name: TestHelpers
description: Class TestHelpers is used to hold static functions required for testing

methods.name: stub
methods.description: Create a test stub which extends a real class and allows overriding of private properties.

params.name: extends
params.description: The fully-qualified name of the class to extend.

params.name: args
params.description: An array of constructor arguments to use when creating the stub.

params.name: props
params.description: A list of private properties on which to enable overrriding.

params.name: trait
params.description: The fully-qualified name of the trait to implement.
